name: Project Scarlett
description:
This is an idea I have had for a few years now. My plan is to create a sandbox game where you can play as DC characters. I just thought DC was lacking in this department (minus the lego games), and I thought I'd create a Prototype and see if it worked.

So, all I ask from you is that if you have an opinion on the game, good or constructive criticism, then please leave a comment.  If you have a suggestion, idea, or bug to report, check out this form: 

Form

Thank you for checking out this game, it took me a while to put together.

Also, READ THE CONTROLS!!
